statements: SELECT * FROM billing_processes;
SELECT insurance_information, treatment_code FROM billing_processes;
SELECT * FROM billing_processes WHERE treatment_code = 123;
SELECT treatment_code, insurance_information FROM billing_processes WHERE treatment_code > 100;
SELECT treatment_code, insurance_information FROM billing_processes ORDER BY insurance_information DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_processes WHERE treatment_code = 123 AND insurance_information = 'ABC Company';
SELECT treatment_code, insurance_information FROM billing_processes WHERE treatment_code = 456 ORDER BY insurance_information DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_processes WHERE insurance_information LIKE '%X%' ORDER BY treatment_code ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_information FROM billing_processes WHERE treatment_code IN (789, 101, 202) AND insurance_information IS NOT NULL;
SELECT treatment_code, COUNT(insurance_information) AS num_insurance FROM billing_processes GROUP BY treatment_code HAVING num_insurance > 1;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentCodes ORDER BY treatment_code DESC
SELECT insurance_name, policy_holder_name FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE insurance_id = 3
SELECT insurance_name, policy_number FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE policy_expiry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT description FROM TreatmentCodes WHERE treatment_code = 10
SELECT * FROM InsuranceInformation
SELECT * FROM TreatmentCodes WHERE treatment_code IN (100, 200, 300)
SELECT insurance_name, policy_holder_name FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE insurance_id = 10
SELECT insurance_name, policy_number FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE policy_expiry_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT treatment_code, description FROM TreatmentCodes WHERE description LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY treatment_code ASC
SELECT insurance_id, insurance_name, policy_number, policy_holder_name, policy_expiry_date FROM InsuranceInformation WHERE insurance_id = 5
SELECT id, treatment_code, insurance_provider, amount_charged FROM billing_info;
SELECT * FROM patient_info ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT claim_number, claim_status FROM claim_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, claim_amount FROM claim_processing WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT insurance_provider, amount_charged FROM billing_info WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT * FROM billing_info WHERE amount_charged > 1000;
SELECT id, insurance_provider FROM billing_info WHERE treatment_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, insurance_id FROM patient_info WHERE insurance_id LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM claim_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_codes;
SELECT code_id, description FROM treatment_codes ORDER BY code_id DESC;
SELECT insurance_name, policy_number FROM insurance_info WHERE provider_name IS NULL;
SELECT bill_id, bill_amount FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE gender='Female' AND date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM treatment_codes;
SELECT treatment_code, description FROM treatment_codes WHERE code_id > 5 ORDER BY treatment_code DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT insurance_name, provider_name FROM insurance_info WHERE policy_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bill_id, patient_id, bill_amount FROM billing_info WHERE bill_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bill_amount ASC, bill_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_id FROM Patients WHERE insurance_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT treatment_code, billed_amount, billing_date FROM BillingRecords ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, insurance_id FROM InsuranceProviders JOIN Patients ON InsuranceProviders.insurance_id = Patients.insurance_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_description FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentCodes ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentCodes.treatment_code;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentCodes WHERE treatment_code = 'TC001'
SELECT patient_name, insurance_id FROM Patients WHERE insurance_id = 1 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ClaimsProcessing WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND processing_status = 'Pending'
SELECT provider_name, insurance_id FROM InsuranceProviders WHERE insurance_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT patient_id, billed_amount, billing_date FROM BillingRecords ORDER BY billing_date ASC
